summary: This document is an email or communication referencing a New York Post article from August 15, 2019, reporting that Ghislaine Maxwell was photographed at an In-N-Out Burger location, which was her first public sighting since Jeffrey Epstein's death. The communication appears to be sharing this news link.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: She is identified as Jeffrey Epstein's 'gal pal' and was reportedly spotted at an In-N-Out Burger in the first photos since Epstein's death.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.role: Deceased financier and accused sex trafficker
persons.context: Referenced in relation to Ghislaine Maxwell as his associate, with the article noting the sighting occurred after his death.

connections.description: Maxwell is described as Epstein's 'gal pal' in the referenced news article, indicating a close personal and social association.

events.title: Ghislaine Maxwell spotted at In-N-Out Burger
events.description: Ghislaine Maxwell was photographed at an In-N-Out Burger location, reported as her first public sighting since Jeffrey Epstein's death.

keyFacts: On August 15, 2019, Ghislaine Maxwell was reportedly photographed at an In-N-Out Burger, marking her first public sighting since Jeffrey Epstein's death.
The information comes from a New York Post article linked in the communication.
The communication appears to be sharing this news link, possibly between individuals monitoring Maxwell's whereabouts.
